subject: Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Greg Robinson will have another season to turn Syracuse around. Athletic Director Daryl Gross said Robinson would remain as the coach in 2008 despite leading the Orange through the worst three-year stretch in the history of the program, including the first two 10-loss seasons in its history. Robinson’s teams have gone 1-10, 4-8 and 2-10; in those 28 losses, Syracuse has been outscored by 514 points.
